About

I’m Lee Briggs, a Staff Software Engineer currently working at Pulumi in Seattle. I’ve worked on lots of cool project using technologies you might be familiar with in the “DevOps World” and I have a real passion for new, emerging technologies to solve complex problems.

If you’re interested in hiring me, check out my Resume and Github or see what I’m Tweeting
